para_sentences.para_0: In this module, we will look into some nuances of working with graphs. We will look at some algorithms that apply graph traversal to solve problems and we will analyze their time complexity (CLO8).
After successful completion of this module, you should be able to do the following (in addition to answering the questions listed below):

ol_0: Implement graph traversal (CLO8)  When to use graphs? How to represent a graph? Implement Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search for a graph (DFS)? Analyze the time complexity of BFS  DFS
Implement Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search for a graph (DFS)?
Analyze the time complexity of BFS  DFS
Apply graph traversal to implement graph-based algorithms (CLO8)  Implement graph traversal to solve problems
Implement graph traversal to solve problems
What is topological sort and how to implement it?
What are the applications of the topological sort?
What is Dijkstra algorithm and how to implement it?
What are the applications of Dijkstra algorithm?
